desc: ABOUT THE PROJECTFor a health Company, we need to build a native application with a custom design (can be adapted from material design in Android) for iOS (iPhone only) and Android .This pages/views have to get information from a REST services (we are going to give you all document related to the REST services) and connect it the information in the UI.We have a login and recovery password, and all internal pages have access to information logged in.This is for a Company in Spanish language. So, we are going to give you all static text in Spanish, the other texts you get from the REST services (You don't need to worry about this, just implement it).We accept suggestion how make the best way to integrate language to the application.We use charset UTF-8.MODULES LIST1.	Login2.	Assigned team (Mi Equipo ACHS)3.	Worker information (Información del trabajador)4.	Certs (Certificados)5.	Membership (Afiliación) (Download PDF)6.	Company Quotation (Cotizacion empresa) (Download PDF)7.	Rates (Tasas)8.	Evaluation (Evaluaciones)9.	Worker Quotation (Cotizacion trabajador)10.	Validator (Validador)11.	Subsidies (Subsidios)13.	Support (Soporte)14.	Attention Centers (Centro de atención)15.	Benefits (Beneficios)16.	Accident Procedures (Procedimientos Accidentes)17.	FAQ (Preguntas Frecuentes)18.	Contact (Contáctanos)This is the wireframe with navigation: [url removed, login to view]Phase 1:We need build all static views with the custom design (made in sketch) until 2017-11-29 (Wednesday)Phase 2:Read data from REST services and deploy information into views for 2017-12-15 (Friday)We need a native application for both platforms (Android / iOS) and we accept builds in React Native, Xamarin, or Android Java / iOS Swift (prefered)

desc: We need a mobile app developer (iPhone and Android) for an established Drupal 7 subscription service. The product is downloadable audio (MP3) files similar to podcasts. We refer to the product as podcasts in this job description.You must be skilled in Javascript with extensive experience in Appcelerator Titanium and the Alloy framework. We prefer a Titanium-Certified Developer.Skills needed:- JavaScript- Appcelerator Titanium Alloy framework- Basic knowledge of Drupal 7 services- Git- App layout and designOur business is built on a recurring subscription model. The app must support an established subscription sign-up process for Android. The Apple App Store version must support signup through the App Store with a subscription product billed through AppleThe first version of the app will:- Support user login/authentication- User account management (password & other attributes attached to the User entity)- Send notifications (SMS & Email) when new podcast is loaded- Let the user search for podcasts from a library- Suggest podcasts that fit user criteria- Allow user to submit comments on podcast- Allow users to favorite a podcast- Allow users to download podcasts and store on mobile device for later use within the app- Serve up the next podcast (netflix style)- Prompt the user to share on social media - Facebook and TwitterTechnical considerations: Drupal 7 serves as the backend with REST endpoints created and managed by our technical lead. An NDA will be required. Graphics for the app will be provided by our designer; text for the app will be provided by our writer.This description outlines the minimum viable product for a first release of features. Additional features will be packaged into subsequent releases.Please respond with a link to a mobile app you helped develop.-
title: Mobile App developer Appcelerator

desc: I need the code and android app for the following project. The Arduino board will be an Uno Rev 3 I need code to drive a stepper motor that must use the Accelstepper.h  library and the SoftwareSerial.h library as the project is to be used via Bluetooth. I need the speed, acceleration and amount of rotation to bounce from a defined limit in the app and back again. The speed, acceleration and amount of rotation need to be controlled via three separate sliders on the app. The app must be made in MITapp inventer for us to style it and tweak it.Also, need a Bluetooth connection button in the app and a emergency stop button.This is a very easy job for someone who understands Arduino and C++here is the base code for the Arduino that currently works but only directly run from the board.<code>// [url removed, login to view]// -*- mode: C++ -*-// Runs one stepper forwards and backwards, accelerating and decelerating// at the limits.//#include <AccelStepper.h>// Define some steppers and the pins the will useAccelStepper stepper1; // Defaults to AccelStepper::FULL4WIRE (4 pins) on 2, 3, 4, 5void setup(){[url removed, login to view](200.0);[url removed, login to view](100.0);[url removed, login to view](24);}void loop(){// Change direction at the limitsif ([url removed, login to view]() == 0)[url removed, login to view]([url removed, login to view]());[url removed, login to view]();[url removed, login to view]();[url removed, login to view]();}<code/>Need this code to run via android Bluetooth with adjustable sliders for each MaxSpeed, Acceleration and moveTo

desc: I am in the IT Services Industry and require an App which can be used by technicians for receiving a job, completing the job card which has been submitted to them (filling in all information such as arrival time, departing time, summary of work completed , status of the job etc, but also need a sign off area which can be done on the smart phone ie. client must be able to sign job off on smart phones.) This must then by submitted by technician.Techs must also have the ability to create new job cards, but not delete on the appFrom an administrative perspective I want the admin department to log into the website, raise these job cards for techs, manage new techs that come onboard, manage new clients etc.The administrative department must be able to view on the website login which jobs have been assigned, status of jobs and completed which can be printed for billing.In short, I am trying to replace the old job card books.I do understand that you will need more information etc but I am trying to see what this would cost me including yearly hosing.
title: Create online job card system
